name: Black Wings No Hope
description:
Black Wings No Hope

You've just moved to Inwood. You never see your parents anymore, and you don't have any friends.

Maybe you should meet some people.

Warning: Some blood and disturbing imagery

Created for the #SpooktoberVNJam

Development

Hey folks, this is just a slice (heh) of a much larger story, Black Wings Over Wildwood. No Hope is about 4k words, but I wrote about 18k (!) for the game jam.

I could have budgeted my time better.

I hope to keep working on it and include all the branches I had to cut (ha!) out, as well as add music and SFX. If you like it, leave a comment or let your friends know about the game.

Keep it spooky,
V Wolfram

Credits

Character Art: sutemo

Backgrounds: Noraneko Games

Blood FX: BlueRoseSonata
